greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: E.g.f. sin(sinh(x)) (odd powers only).
reference: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
mathematica: With[{nn = 50}, Take[CoefficientList[Series[Sin[Sinh[x]], {x, 0, nn}], x] Range[0, nn - 1]!, {2, -1, 2}]] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 11 2014 *)
results.author: _R. H. Hardin_, _Simon Plouffe_
